Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19778602]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=2.34 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC43300 (MIC=9.38 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=4.69 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML-35P (MIC=18.75 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=4.69 µg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19778602] It has 46.13 ± 1.49% hemolytic activity at 100 μg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic activity against rabbit red cells..

Literature.Title: Peptidomics and genomics analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides from the frog, Rana nigrovittata.
